title: UBS Clients Lost Millions
text:
I read the following article in the weekend edition of the Wall St. Journal today.

I don't have a subscription to the WSJ and apologize for the poor graphics quality.

UBS clients invested in the Yield Enhancement Strategy (YES) lost millions of dollars.

Some clients contend that their brokers misrepresented the inherent risks of the strategy.

YES employed an esoteric options strategy called an "iron condor" and charged investors 1.75%.

Over the past decade, regulators cited UBS for securities-law violations at least nine times.

In all cases, UBS settled with regulators neither admitting or denying the allegations.
